title: How Blest Are They Who Trust in Christ

lyrics.text:
How blest are they who trust in Christ When we and those we love must part:
We yield them up, for go they must, But do not lose them from our heart.

In ripened age, their harvest reaped, Or gone from us in youth or prime,
In Christ they have eternal life, Released from all the bonds of time.

In Christ, who tasted death for us, We rise above our natural grief,
And witness to a stricken world The strength and splendor of belief.

author: Fred Pratt Green (1972)
